LanguageData.Grimm_Boarbatusk.label: 獠牙野豬
LanguageData.Grimm_Boarbatusk.description: 獠牙野豬是有四隻腳的野豬,背部上有一排毫毛、獅鼻和獠牙.\n\n獠牙野豬有四隻眼睛和像是骨頭的面具,似乎是被黑色的血管狀繫帶緊緊卡進面部,牠的背部和腿上有一排骨板保護,並且有兩組獠牙,其中一組又大又彎,然而牠們的腹部相較之下成為弱點,幾乎沒有護甲或防禦手段.
LanguageData.Grimm_Boarbatusk.tools.0.label: 主獠牙
LanguageData.Grimm_Boarbatusk.tools.1.label: 副獠牙
LanguageData.Grimm_Boarbatusk.tools.2.label: 頭
LanguageData.Grimm_Boarbatusk_Corpse.label: 獠牙野豬屍體
LanguageData.Grimm_Beowolf.label: 貝奧狼
LanguageData.Grimm_Beowolf.description: 貝奧狼是龐大、漆黑、如狼人的生物,貝奧狼能依靠後腿直立,平時是駝著的姿態,並且有著強大的肌力.牠們的體型差異極大,通常與人類差不多,但有的體型是人類的兩倍之多.
LanguageData.Grimm_Beowolf.tools.0.label: 左爪
LanguageData.Grimm_Beowolf.tools.1.label: 右爪
LanguageData.Grimm_Beowolf.tools.3.label: 頭
LanguageData.Grimm_Beowolf_Corpse.label: 貝奧狼屍體
LanguageData.Grimm_Ursa.label: 拉丁熊
LanguageData.Grimm_Ursa.description: 拉丁熊是如同熊一般的龐大生物,看起來很像貝奧狼,有著黑色體毛和背部的骨刺,以及像是骨頭的面具和紅色眼睛,但是與貝奧狼相比更大隻也更粗壯.
LanguageData.Grimm_Ursa.tools.0.label: 左爪
LanguageData.Grimm_Ursa.tools.1.label: 右爪
LanguageData.Grimm_Ursa.tools.3.label: 頭
LanguageData.Grimm_Ursa_Corpse.label: 拉丁熊屍體
LanguageData.Grimm_Griffon.label: 獅鳩獸
LanguageData.Grimm_Griffon.description: 獅鷲獸是大型飛行種,擁有掠食性鳥類的頭部、翅膀和爪子,以及大型貓科的後腳、尾巴和身軀,一身有黑色體毛和羽毛,體表,頭部及翅膀邊上有像是骨頭的白色增生物,牠的頭部有白色的喙和四隻紅眼沿著喙旁的灰色繫帶排列.
LanguageData.Grimm_Griffon.tools.0.label: 左爪
LanguageData.Grimm_Griffon.tools.1.label: 右爪
LanguageData.Grimm_Griffon.tools.2.label: 喙
LanguageData.Grimm_Griffon_Corpse.label: 獅鳩獸屍體
LanguageData.Grimm_Nevermore.label: 影魔鴉
LanguageData.Grimm_Nevermore.description: The Nevermore is an avian that has features resembling those of several other bird species. Two notable examples of this are its resemblances to condors and ravens. Like other Grimm, it has a mask-like, white bony structure overlaying the upper front of its head. It also has four glowing red eyes, two on each side of its head. The headpiece also includes a dorsal spine or fin, reminiscent of that on the heads of condors and some prehistoric pterosaurs.
LanguageData.Grimm_Nevermore.tools.0.label: 爪子
LanguageData.Grimm_Nevermore.tools.1.label: 喙
LanguageData.Grimm_Nevermore_Corpse.label: 影魔鴉屍體
LanguageData.Grimm_Lancer.label: 索矛蜂
LanguageData.Grimm_Lancer.description: Lancers have a three-segmented black body with three sets of legs. They have a white armored mask and armor along their back. On the back of their abdomen, the armor is in four overlapping plates. They have jagged pincers, antenna, four red transparent wings and a stinger.
LanguageData.Grimm_Lancer.tools.0.label: 刺
LanguageData.Grimm_Lancer.tools.1.label: 口器
LanguageData.Grimm_Lancer_Corpse.label: 索矛蜂屍體
LanguageData.Grimm_LancerQueen.label: 女王索矛蜂
LanguageData.Grimm_LancerQueen.description: Lancers have a three-segmented black body with three sets of legs. They have a white armored mask and armor along their back. On the back of their abdomen, the armor is in four overlapping plates. They have jagged pincers, antenna, four red transparent wings and a stinger.
LanguageData.Grimm_LancerQueen.tools.0.label: 刺
LanguageData.Grimm_LancerQueen.tools.1.label: 口器
LanguageData.Grimm_LancerQueen_Corpse.label: 女王索矛蜂屍體
LanguageData.Grimm_DeathStalker.label: 死亡闊步者
LanguageData.Grimm_DeathStalker.description: As opposed to most Creatures of Grimm, which have black fur or feathers, a Death Stalker has a jet-black exoskeleton underneath several large, white, bonelike plates upon its back, which are adorned with red markings. One of the more prominent attributes of this Grimm is the glowing golden stinger on its tail that it uses as a lure. It also has a pair of large pincers that it uses to defend itself and grab or cut into its prey. The Death Stalker's ten red eyes and markings can also glow in the dark when it chooses to reveal itself to its prey.
LanguageData.Grimm_DeathStalker.tools.0.label: 刺
LanguageData.Grimm_DeathStalker.tools.1.label: 口器
LanguageData.Grimm_DeathStalker.tools.2.label: 左鉗夾
LanguageData.Grimm_DeathStalker.tools.3.label: 右鉗夾
LanguageData.Grimm_DeathStalker_Corpse.label: 死亡闊步者屍體
LanguageData.Grimm_Nuckelavee.label: 半人馬
LanguageData.Grimm_Nuckelavee.description: 半人馬是龐大、如同馬一樣的戮獸,是兩種不同戮獸組成,分別是類人戮獸和馬戮獸,兩者融合在一起.
LanguageData.Grimm_Nuckelavee.tools.0.label: 左爪
LanguageData.Grimm_Nuckelavee.tools.1.label: 右爪
LanguageData.Grimm_Nuckelavee.tools.2.label: 左蹄
LanguageData.Grimm_Nuckelavee.tools.3.label: 右蹄
LanguageData.Grimm_Nuckelavee.tools.4.label: 頭
LanguageData.Grimm_Nuckelavee_Corpse.label: 半人馬屍體
LanguageData.Grimm_Apathy.label: 掠魂獸
LanguageData.Grimm_Apathy.description: The Apathy is humanoid in shape, somewhat similar to the Imp, but are very tall, with long arms that reach down as far as the ground and extremely long fingers. They have hideous faces, resembling skulls, some even lacking nostrils, and low-hanging jaws.
LanguageData.Grimm_Apathy.tools.0.label: 右手
LanguageData.Grimm_Apathy.tools.1.label: 左手
LanguageData.Grimm_Apathy_Corpse.label: 掠魂獸屍體
